meter_reading.notes: Meter orientation check: BADGER METER text at top, digital display readable left-to-right. White digits (5 digits on left): 0 2 2 7 1 = 2271 m³. Black digit (single digit on right, separated): 4 = 0.4 m³. Red dial analysis: Dial orientation: '0' mark at top of dial (12 o'clock position), '5' mark at bottom of dial (6 o'clock position). Dial number scale position: pointing at approximately 5.0, Clock position: 6 o'clock, Degrees: 180° (pointing DOWN), Verification: Hand is pointing DOWN ✓. Dial reading: 180/3600 = 0.050 m³. Total: 2271 + 0.4 + 0.05 = 2271.45 m³. Note: Image quality is slightly blurry making black digit reading challenging - appears to be 4 but could potentially be 3 or 5. Red dial hand clearly pointing downward at 5 position (180 degrees).
